scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && bun run build && bunx tauri build
scripts.start:frontend: cd frontend && bun run tauri dev
scripts.install:backend: cd backend && python3 -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.install:all: npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.clean: rm -rf backend/venv frontend/node_modules frontend/dist frontend/src-tauri/target backend/dist backend/build
scripts.clean:windows: rmdir /s backend\venv frontend\node_modules frontend\dist frontend\src-tauri\target backend\dist backend\build
scripts.lint:frontend: cd frontend && bunx eslint src --ext ts,tsx --report-unused-disable-directives --max-warnings 0
